content.detailedDescription:
It was late march of 1967. i was in the army at that time, and assigned to an air defense center in key west, florida. i spent many of my nights in a radar control center watching the various screens. my second cousin was also in the scope dope business. he was in the air force at the time and worked in a radar station in homestead, florida, just outside miami. we spent many an evening conversing on the air defense net, although our conversations rarely had anything to do with air defense. 

my cousin called me one night on the net and advised me that something unbelievable was happening in south florida. he opened the net so i could monitor the traffic regarding the incident taking place. i pulled my headset to my ears as i listed to various norad stations tracking a ufo just of the coast of miami. at the time, homestead was a sac base, and any such traffic was a great concern to the air force.

although i was about 100 miles from the target under discussion, i had the capability to observed activity in the area with my own radar. i had only to take it off standby. as i was bringing up my antenna, the chatter continued, and referred to three more objects in the sky near miami. it was also noted that civilian observers had now sighted the objects and the sighting was being reported on local commercial radio.

as my scope came up the first thing i noticed was three marine fighters departing boca chica naval air station, heading north. the ufos were clearly visible just southeast of miami. they appeared to be moving just east of north, skirting the florida coast. they then turned sharply west, crossing the keys near everglades national park on the south tip of the florida mainland. it only took the phantoms a few minutes to reach the area of the bogies. i have no idea if the pilots sighted the targets visually, or electronically. the air channel was not part of the norad net. 

as the phantoms approached the targets they disappeared off  the scope. now there is only one way to disappear when being observed by a par (pulse acquisition radar). you must go straight up, or straight down. 

this cat and mouse game went on all night. much to much to type in this report. visual observations in miami reportedly included the observation of one large object and three small. this i can not verify, although i imagine the miami herald would have some record of it. to me, they appeared to be flying a search pattern. the way the coast guard would search in grids. 

after about four hours one of the unknowns began moving south directly towards my location. the target was really moving, probably twice the speed of anything i had ever tracked, around 1100 miles an hour. this would provide me with an excellent opportunity to lock onto the target with a different type of radar. this other type of radar, which i probably should not identify, has the capability of bringing back actual sounds of the target . turbo prop, jet engines, or the thud of rotary aircraft could clearly be heard with this system.

as the target approached it decelerated  but was still super sonic. i brought the targeting radar into alignment with it and brought the unit on line. for a short moment, a very short moment, i could hear a high pitched whine, similar to a jet engine, but smoother and much higher pitch. at this point the target obviously detected my lock and hit my sight with some type of  electronic counter measure. it appeared to reverse the polarity of every piece of equipment on the sight, although i was never able to verify that. needless to say this caused an instant shut down of the system and erased a great many taxpayer dollars. 

as i was exiting the control center the launch crew stated that they had seen the object pass over. it was moving so fast that one of the guys swore it was a meteorite, but was flying level.

when last seen the object was headed south towards cuba.

it was many years later that i read newspaper articles about a two week flap in the miami area. i would also later learn about a cuban mig21 that was allegedly destroyed during an encounter with a ufo in march 1967.
content.summary: Air defense radar operator tracking multiple targets over s. florida and gulf.

content.detailedDescription: After moving to washington state in early june, just camping and enjoying different places in the cascade mts., all we had was an open air tarp and bed-roll set up the night i believe i had an encounter with an alien  being on the bank of the wenatchee river, 3 miles west of leavenworth wa. u.S.A. on or about june 15th 1992. i remember hearing a rustling in the bushes and rolled over on my stomach to look and did a double take when i saw a typical large eyed, small bodied alien staring at me. it was faintly glowing a light green translucent color. i was not truly afraid until i looked into its shining black eyes. i instantly turned to reach for a very large butcher knife that i had planted in the ground beside me. right before i touched the knife, everything went blank. these events took maybe 3 or 4 seconds. later that night i woke and built a big campfire. i could not go back to sleep. i remember having 3 vivid "dreams" before getting up and starting the fire. the first memories of the first dream were of looking out a window and seeing space with stars. there were big blank rectangular areas where there were no stars like something was flying alongside invisible, but blocking the view of the stars. i remember being led through a giant ship that reminded me of a huge mall. there were different types of creatures. some were normal human looking. i could not speak and no one seemed at all interested in me. i forget the second "dream". the 3rd dream was a stormy night dream where i was sucked up into a tornado. ( very vivid memory of this. ) that is when i finally woke up just shaking with fear. i've thought about doing the hypnosis thing to see what really happened but have not. i didn't tell anybody about this for about 3 years. i tried to convince myself for some time that it was a dream, but i could not deny the reality of the alien encounter. i once read a book ( i forget the title ) about ufo sightings and there was only one sighting among the stories that were in washington state. the sighting was of a ufo seen by mt rainier on the same date as my encounter. i also read about the hundreds of uso's that were seen coming out of the water by many witnesses around santa monica california earlier that same evening which spurred a lot of calls to the police in the area. my only child was born exactly 10 years to the day of this event. coincidence?
content.summary: I never saw the ufo until on board and it looked sort of like a mall.

content.detailedDescription: Bright light casting a glow on trees passed over multiple areas
content.summary: Bright light casting a glow on trees

content.detailedDescription:
It was a mild february night around 10 pm. i went out in the front of my house with my dog and while looking across the street i saw between the pine trees a star like object going up behind the pine trees and slowly continuing upward to the night sky. it continued its path upward to the curve of the night sky and disappeared. as i watched it, i was not in fear but in awe as to what it was. i wanted to take a picture of it, but figured by the time i got back with my camera it would be gone. so i just watched it until it disappeared. it seemed to go into the blackness of the night sky. after it disappeared i waited to see if anything else would happen and since nothing did i went back inside my home with the dog. i was still in awe after it left and to this day puzzled as to what it was. 

prior to this event, about a week before i was taking my cat to get clipped and dipped and while passing the block called under hill rd. there was a white truck that was marked flood clean up. i did not pay too much attention to it and went on my way. about 3 hours later on the way back to pick up my cat, i went the same way and that same truck was in the same spot on the same road. there was kind of a haze around it and i had the feeling that if i turned down that road that something weird would happen to me. in this area there is a man made hill that goes out to babcock st. and unless you walk up the hill you can't see what lies beyond. so again to this day i am wondering what i saw and if the two incidents are related in some way.
content.summary: I saw star like object ascend from the ground up into the night sky and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed 4 glowing objects flying above longwood fl, crossing wikiva springs road - witnessed while driving at 11pm feb 25. objects appeared to travel together and gaining altitude forming a square.  at first appeared as large glowing 4 balloons.  after approximately 3 min traveling together objects appeared smaller as if gaining altitude back into space.  i used a video editor to cut out the sound - my son was too excited - video contains a sample watermark but was unedited.
content.summary: 4 glowing lights traveling east to west

content.detailedDescription: Drove up to publix on atlanta highway in montgomery, al to see 5 yellow lights in a disc pattern moving across the sky just behind the store to the northwest. it was making a wide circle over the residential area behind the store, before the lights faded and a new red blinking light appeared, just like a helicopter or commercial airplane. the light flew away and then returned, appearing to become larger as the 5 lights slowly came on again. when the yellow lights came on it was clear that this thing was very large, probably the size of a large commercial airliner. it did this a few more times before turning on its blinking red light and moving away to the west. unlike any helicopter i've ever seen or heard of, though its movements and blinking red lights were just like a helicopters.
content.summary: 5 slowly pulsating yellow lights in a disc formation, which faded away and were followed by a helicopter-like blinking red light

content.detailedDescription: My wife son and myself had just picked up my daughter from her church youth group in barrington nh, we were heading north on rt 125 t'word rochester, nh, just as we entered gonic i saw very bright white light to the nw through the trees. i pointed it out to the family and everyone was watching this light trying to get a better look at it. about a half a mile later it crossed over rt 125 just ahead of us, there were no blinking lights just an extremely bright light with no sound that we could hear, traveling about 45 mph with the windows up. as we came around a small bend in the road there was a clearing where my wife, daughter, and son got a really good look. it looked like a very bright moving ball of light. then it changed direction going east and seemed to change shape to a long tube. then all the lights dimmed out and flared up really bright again and it appeared to change shape again, to a triangle with three discernible lights along the edge of the triangle, that were a gold/yellow in color but in the middle of the triangle there were what looked like three square windows which were very bright. then the three lights that looked like windows dimmed then went out completely one at a time from left to right.This was just as i was braking hard and pulling into the breakdown lane so i could get a good look myself, it was as if it knew we saw it and it went dark as i was stopping. my daughter said she could still see it,it was a  very, very dim dark orange color and it continued on to the east out of sight quickly. it was the weirdest thing to see, especially the feeling we all got like it knew we saw it and were stopping so it went dark. i am thinking that the reason it appeared to change shape was because the angle at which we were observing this object was changing, making it appear to be morphing into different shapes.The whole sighting lasted aprox 3 min.
content.summary: Spotted bright white ball of light in the ncaw flew se over highway right in front of us turned e lights went out flew away

content.detailedDescription: At 7:40p.M. this evening i was looking in the northeast traction at the woods way across the field and i noticed a whitish yellow color ball of light that was hovering in the air above the treeline then it would occasionally the zig zag and  move left to right and then the light would go out or it would disappear. i seen this object also yesterday evening,and the evening before its been in the area quite a bit a lot lately. it also sometimes looks to be a reddish orange color that changes color to a white yellow color.Yesterday evening i watched the same type of object for over an hour it would appear hover go back and forth over the tree line and then it would disappear or turn the lights out.I'm not sure if it's the same object or what it's doing but it seems to go to the same area for the last several nights.So you better have so you have a better idea of where the location is i'm on north county line in brighton michigan near dundee right off of and 50 and i'm looking in the northeast direction over the woods across the field.I tried to get a picture but i don't have a camera and my phone's camera isn't that good.I'm gonna buy a camera for the future.My roommate also watched these lights with me and for what it's worth, he used to work for an airport and said airplanes don't move like that and are not allowed to shut their lights off like that. it definitely wasn't any type of known aircraft.
content.summary: It was a red orange circle shaped ball of light that would change color to whitish yelloe color.

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright sunny clouldless early afternoon , when a friend and i noticed a bright flash of light to our n.E. , from our position about 7 miles south of ehrenberg arizona ; it looked to me the flash was caused by a collision with a passenger jet going towards l.A. calif. ; the plane continued on towards l.A. , and the flash of light became a mass of something stationary  slowly rotating and changing shape; it apeared to be a large transparent diamond (large , a mile across); it changed to a lime green rotating saucer, then it started to look like a mass of bent metal , allways rotating; for some reason ,i could no longer understand what i was seeing , because i felt some intelligent force (like a group) keeping me from seeing what it really was.It started to turn invisable and then come back into view 4 times , before it disappeared and did not reappear ; it was the length of a passenger jet , or so it appeared.  to the left of where it was (now invisable) two brown saucers appeared ; they both at the same time , came toward us; for about 5 seconds i was scared to death; the saucers moved back in place , and the fear left as well. it looked as if the two brown saucers went 10 miles in less than a second , coming towards me , and leaving. they dissapeared and a oval craft withe a white center and dark outer shell appeared to decend at a 45���angle, very very slow. we watched this until it went out of view , towards highway 95 in calif.; these are most of the facts ; about 9 months later , a top secret post in europe where i once worked , expelled 5 millitary people for talking to aliens with a ouija board. was the beam a scan , and was it making contact with the millitary ??? i'd like to know. this same oval craft has been seen on tv , playing with a passinger jet in 2006 and later.    end of report.
content.summary: .Saw a flash of light that turned out to be stationary and almost hit a plane; it turned invisable after hitting me with a beam causing fear

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the house and heard helicopters pass over close enough to rattle my walls and windows.  after the second pass, i decided to investigate.  as i came outside, i saw the helicopters just over my house from east to west and then disappear out of sight. i immediately noticed one hundred and one hundred and fifty white reflective round objects floating high in the sky over the mountain.  there was no exact pattern but they never left a specific altitude range and traveled from east to west until i could no longer see them behind the building next door. these objects were very far off in the distance and not in any close proximity to the helicopters.  this was witnessed by myself, my neighbor and my daughter.
content.summary: Multiple round objects floating in sky after helicopters passed the times in different directions i

content.detailedDescription: I am the contactee mediator in action for acceptance for pleiades,nordic,which they are not yet we call them this names. they are inmage of human and godly they are. my works are to be a in-between-person as to exsample carry deals to and from in the physical and travels.Mediator accepts investigations in the helping for contract to and from earth and home base to establish student exchange info then face to face.My mission rests upon the people for acceptance and proper focus for the best interest of human kind in assistance to peace around the world. mediator comes foreward 2014 with truth, expose,in physical,communication to humankind and future contacts of peace,love,and light. this mission is for us all yet i have no protection. take me to your leader
content.summary: I was invited aborard to get help i visited with them in communication of english they tout me in godly way of them ,craft,their home base , planet,cloning,their library,contact and said i am to be their mediator so i am. all messages to the people

content.detailedDescription: I was with my then girlfriend at the time and we had just got to the mall after eating lunch.  i was waiting for my convertable top to close when i looked up to see why it was taking so long.  i noticed something flying in the sky that at first i assumed was a bird because of she shape, but then i thought about it and realized it was way too high to be a bird and it's movement was too steady, not like a bird in flight.  as i was trying to figure out what it was, it picked up speed and begain to do very tight figure eight's.  in my amazement i tried to point it out to my girlfriend, but she wasn't wearing her glasses and couldn't see that far.  all of the sudden it shot into the upper atmosphere and out of sight.  there was no noise at all during the event.  i couldn't believe what i had just witnessed.  i tried to make since of what i saw and not just jump to the conclusion that it was an alien craft.  i couldn't explain it.  i won't pretend to know every craft we have in our employ in the usaf, but i'm sure we don't have anything that can bank like that.
content.summary: Small single craft doing figure 8

content.detailedDescription: Was on vacation standing on balcony facing ocean on about the 10th fl.With my wife when i observed what seemed to be a bright light heading in our direction s.W.Toward the beach and then realized there was a formation of minamum 6 maximum 8 objects.At first i htought it strange that they would be in the flight path of the nieghboring airport for mainland departing flights and as they got closer they didnt have any marker lights and werent omiting any sound what so ever.They seemed to be about2to 3 hundred feet apart and about 1,000 ft when closest to our location.When just in front of us they changed direction and started heading due north and were just as bright departing in that direction as they were approaching.Could not make out objects definition because of the brightnes of objects.They then seemed to slowly disappear as they proceeded toward the evening horizen,actually looked as they were slowly going into the water.My wife and i were at aw ,at what we just observed.Never saw anything of the sort b4.
content.summary: 6 to 8 lights in straight formation.

content.detailedDescription:
We believe abductions run in our family.  my mother has memories of seeing ufo's when she was younger, as well as memories of dissolving into walls, waking up in places other than where she originally fell asleep, etc.  her father (my grandfather) also has memories of seeing ufo's in his backyard in rural ohio.  interestingly enough he worked for nasa for the majority of his career.  as for myself, i have remnants of experiences pop up in dreams, including medical procedures.  just recently i saw an interesting orb like sphere outside my home. between the two of us, we have lots of experiences.

several weeks ago my mother woke up and noticed she had a puncture wound on both her left and right palms of her hands.  she has no recollection of receiving them and is certain they were not there the night prior.  the puncture on her left palm quickly healed and is now gone.  the puncture on her right palm looks as though it is infected.  after several weeks it is still noticeable.  it causes my mother slight pain when touched. she says it feels hard beneath the surface of her skin.

i am including a photo of my mother's right palm and the interesting mark on it.
content.summary: Puncture wounds on palms.  possible implant.

content.detailedDescription:
It was new year's eve approximately 9pm my husband and i went out in our backyard and noticed a bright orangey yellow object kind of an oval shape it was very bright and moved in a straight line toward us. we remarked how strange it looked and both agreed it was not a plane or helicopter since we see them frequently over our home. it seemed to come toward us the passed overhead turned very quickly to the right and completely seemed to totally disappear! it was a very clear night no clouds at all we were amazed! we had no idea where it had gone! it freaked me out. next day i was telling my son about the incident , he lives in north scottsdale, he said a weird thing happened over his backyard as well same evening. he was outside w a friend and the whole backyard lit up. it made them look up to see where the light was coming from and saw an object! then it quickly left. i have been trying to find out if anyone else reported seeing it that eve. can u let me know
thanks
content.summary: A yellows orange oval object hovered and then turned like, flipped and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
My father was in the navy and an officer.He came home from leave and was showing mom some pictures.He called me over and told me (i must have been 7 or 8 at the time to keep my mouth shut and remember these pictures for the rest of my life as he handed them to me to stare at.If it gets out i showed you these pictures,i will be in danger and you and mommy will be too.You can open your mouth when i pass away one day.I am 71 years old as of yesterday and never opened my mouth.I want you to know this as at my age i am on the banana peel and one foot in the grave,lol.So before i pass on,i want you to hear this story.This has been bugging me for years.The pictures were of a strange circular saucer and it looked silver and shiny.On the sides were some sort of strange letters or symbles and it was weird looking to me.Dad said they were from another planet and he had to return them when he left the house,in the morning or the same day or that nite??? i can be placed on a truth machine as this story is the truth.Dad said the service considered them top secret and on the yellow envelope it said so as well.I was scared and even to this day thinking about it,its real,and why keep everyone from knowing whats going on.Only i don't want my name or age for the world to know.Just to play it safe.He wanted me to know we weren't alone and it was for real and hoped i lived long enough to see one because we aren't alone.Thats for sure!!Tho the service wants to keep it a deep secret.
i put in a fake date and detales just to be able to send you this letter.If you call me,please leave a message.I sometimes forget to take my phone with me or don't hear it ring.I do call back.At my age i am glad i remember my name,loli would love to tell you the whole story.Much better than writing this to you.
content.summary: Read the letter i wrote and will tell more when we meet.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, may 18, 2013 at about 11:00 p.M. my wife and i were standing on our front porch smoking a cigarette, when suddenly my wife pointed and said, "what the f is that"!!!???  i turned around and immediately noticed a huge glowing reddish orange object flying north to south over las cruces, n.M. just a couple hundred yards away from us. the object at this time was a couple hundred feet off the ground moving north to south in a slight diagonal downward direction. it came to a stop approximately less than 100 feet off the ground and passed parallel from me and my wife a few hundred yards away from us. it then started moving east going away from us in an upward diagonal direction.  once the object started moving away from us, it no longer had the red and orange glow, but instead it looked like a star moving through the sky with a random bright and dim fluttering light.  as i was waiting to lose sight of it, expecting it to fly past and behind the organ mountains, it suddenly started to descend somewhere near the organ mountains. i eventually lost sight of the object as it had descended lower than my line of view over the houses. my wife was able to capture a few of the bright flutters from the object on her cell phone before we lost view of the object.  at this point my wife decided to grab her digital camera in case we saw anything else and in less than 10 minutes my wife pointed out another big reddish orange object directly north of us, coming directly towards us! again the object was moving from north to south in a downward diagonal direction.  the object flew/floated directly over us less than 100 feet. as it was directly over us, there was no longer a huge glow. neither my wife or i were able to make out any kind of shape to the object, almost as if it was transparent.  the only thing i saw was what looked to be little bits of fire flames coming off the object. the object then stopped almost directly above us and changed directions moving in a slight upward diagonal direction moving northeast. just like the first object, once this one was moving away from us it wasn't glowing red and orange but instead looked like a star with random bright and dim flutters. i eventually lost sight of the object as it flew away northeast of us. neither objects had any sound as they flew. completely silent! both objects also flew from downtown las cruces to the organ mountains in about 1 minute with no sound. from downtown las cruces to the organ mountains is approximately 15 miles. on top of the cell phone video of the first object, my wife was able to capture 3 digital photos of the 2nd object.  in the video you will notice a constant bright light.  look directly to the right of the bright light and you will see the object flutter right before and after a car passes by on the video.  i can't honestly tell you what i saw because i truly don't know what it was, but i can say with confidence that this was something special and out of the ordinary!
content.summary: 2 ufo's flying over las cruces new mexico

content.detailedDescription: Let the dogs out and saw a beautiful moon. grabbed my phone to take a picture, snapped one,  viewed it saw the anomoly.Took 8 more approx.2 seconds apart.
content.summary: Visible in photographs only. took pictures 2 seconds apart. total 11 pictures.

content.detailedDescription: While playing my guitar in the front of my home, i observed a square balloon-like object moving directly toward me from the north-west for about three minutes. the object appeared to rotate and was shiny on one side and black on the other. a dobbins afb jet on regular sortie flight pattern flew below and to the south of the object and the object descended and disappeared from sight. the object then reappeared a good distance to the south-west in just a few seconds. i thought that i had lost the object in the sunlight which was behind me to my left (south) but the airplane was still visible. it wasn't until i reviewed the video when i realized that it actually disappeared on the video also. i am unclear of what this object was.  it didn't seem much smaller than the airplane flying by but it was hard to tell the distance but it appeared to be smaller than the airplane when it flew pass.  i attempted to video the object when it reappeared but my video did not show anything.
content.summary: Dissappearing object

content.detailedDescription:
I did not really notice it until i downloaded the pictures of our trip to south dakota. i know that my camera does not have a blue light on it. it is green. i did not have the light in any other photo's. 

this is not the first time i have seen things. i have seen many.
content.summary: Noticed it on a picture i took

content.detailedDescription:
I thought from a guess that they state or county was working on a main road after dark with very bright lights, the strength of which i'd not seen before. i and my friend driving happened to be going in that direction and i was ready to be disappointed that we would soon see barricades and a detour sign.

the lights seemed stationary. in fact at first notice they were so low that the origin (actual lamps) of the light were not visible and just the glow of the (construction work area? - not!) we were at that first notice, about two miles from the lights.

as we got within' a mile it was easy to count three lights. very soon after that i knew somehow that it was at least one ufo - based on the fact that the lights were too high off the ground to be street lights, let alone construction lights. there were no tall buildings in that area. my gut feeling was to try and get past the area as smoothly and quick as possible. the closer we got, the more discomfort i felt. 

my friend who was driving had a different feeling though. he wanted to stop - right beneath the object - which he did and parked the car on the side of the roand. other cars (2) pulled off the road as well. my friend got out of the car and stared up at the large hovering craft. i turned and looked out the back window and saw that a lady had also gotten out of her car too, so after a few seconds i exited the car too. but i stood close to my open passenger door not moving any closer to the craft. it was only about 60 ft. off the ground. "let's get out of here man!"

i was almost relieved when the craft finally took off after a short time. (i dont know how long that times was.) the craft took of with very little or no sound at all and as the night sky was very clear we could see it's path for probably 50 miles or so. it cleared that distance on a even smooth curved path out over lake michigan in less than three or four seconds.

ever since than i have always been interested in any explanation of what i (and my friend and other witnesses) saw that night. i have seen and heard a lot of information about triangular shaped ufo's, and some of the drawings and artist renditions reflect very closely what i saw. i could add only a few small details.

one big point i have now is that of all i have heard or read about, the triangular ufo sightings are not all that uncommon, but this event happened in 1974, and all others seemed to have been witnessed in the 80s or later.
content.summary: Triangular,60ft sides, hover then take-off, 60ft from ground, very close (80yds?)

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back steps smoking a cigarette. when i looked up and slightly to my right i saw a large oval object floating past the water tower that is in a park behind my house. the tower is the size of any normal water tower a midsize town would have.It was oval shaped and silver colored (really shiny like that bean in chicago)but on the under side you seen like a yellowish reflection that formed the underside.( which i believe is the reflection of the school buses that are parked in a storage lot next to the base of the water tower.It was literally 200-300 feet off of the ground and floating south. the thing that gets me is when i saw the craft i didn't have any desire to jump up and run across my yard to get a better look. i just sat there and watched it like it was an every day occurrence. the other thing is there were people in the park that day, there were like baseball games going on or soccer, something like that. and those fields are right next to the base of the water tower also and no one saw this thing?
content.summary: Saw large silver and gold object slowly passing by water tower

content.detailedDescription:
It was 7:20 on new years eve. i was about to drive my daughter to a friends house for a new years eve party. we both exited out the side gate of our property, and before getting into the car, we both noticed a dullish red/orange spherical object through the trees over the river in front of our house. i was about 200 feet from where we stood, travelling e about 5mph, maybe 80ft above the river. throughout this description, please keep in mind that we were pretty much seeing this thing from only one side. 

the object was about the size of a vw beetle car, and was not exactly round, but a round/diamond shape. the exterior was a lighted transparent orange/red color with a whitish/yellow bright orb visible in the center to top of the shape. the shape had an open top where you could see the center ball of light not only through the orange/red shape, but above the open top as well. there were a couple of dark lines that ran horizontally across the side of the object. looking very closely, you could also see what i would almost describe as a wing, or fin on the front off to the side, down below the object. it was very transparent, barely red or orange in color, and kind of shimmering with tiny lights. both my daughter and i were completely mesmerized by the sight, and kept repeating "what is that". because it was so close to us, it was very easy to see.

as it moved to the ne, following the river, it ascended rather steeply. it was at that time that i remembered my cell phone camera, and got a video as it ascended into the sky. it was when it was high up in the sky that it started to pulsate and then i noticed another pulsating light not far from the one we witnessed. they disappeared into the sky.

i thought about pursuing it, but by then it was too high up in the sky. i have never in all my life seen anything like this, and since that time, have scoured the internet in search seeing or hearing a similar story like it, but not found exactly the same story or picture. it was a very exciting and perplexing experience to say the least.
content.summary: Translcent, red orange exterior, whitish bright orb interior. open top, black lines on side. almost transparent front wing

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking my dog at about 10pm. it was a very clear june night in 1991. the stars were bright in spite of the light glow from downtown which is less than two miles (straight line) away. we had left our home and walked north across the street and then turned right, downhill and east for about 135 feet to the corner. while my dog was busy smelling about, i looked about the neighborhood to the north, east, and south.
  while looking south, a strange, out of place darkness caught my attention. the normally bright sky was missing and i remember staring at this "void" sky and wondering why i couldn't see the clouds. then i saw the movement.
  this darkness had a shape which i could see only when the end of it passed over me toward the south south-east. it was moving slowly at a steady pace. there was no noise and my dog did not become aware of it.
  the rear edge became clear and sharp as the bright sky appeared behind it. the shape revealed to me was circular and its thickness was defined by a clear, straight, vertical line which connected the two circular edges which i assumed to be the top and bottom of the shape.
  
  using basic triangular math, this object, if at an altitude of 500 ft. had to be 500+ ft. in diameter. it "felt" to me that the object was about 800-1,000 ft. high, which would increase the object's dimensions greatly.

a personal word:  i am male, and at the time of this observance, i was 54 years old and in great health. my eyesight was above average at 20/10 vision. as a member of the u.S. army i served in korea during 1954-56. i became familiar with daytime and nighttime flights of the air force near the border (dmz) with north korea.  
after the military, i worked for a large civilian airline (twa) in chicago, both at midway and o'hare airports. i worked at o'hare when the boeing 707 was introduced to commercial flight. during those years i worked the night shift exclusively. i was able to discern the types of aircraft in flight at night, as did the majority of my fellow employees. 

  the strangest part of this to me is that i did not become excited! my dog and i merely crossed the street and went home. i mentioned it to no one, not even my wife. i never completely forgot the experience but it didn't seem important until i was at that corner again with my neighbors, months later, and i felt excitement for the first time when i was telling them about it.
  i should have been shouting about this to the rooftops!  several of my friends, twa pilots and crew, had privately shared tales of ufo's back in the late '50's, so i knew of ufo's and should have been quite excited, but at the time it felt just "ordinary"!
content.summary: A large, thick disc.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst waiting at red traffic light on 150st, and 35 ave, in queens n,y, facing south, a bright white light caught my attention, looking at about 50 degrees up, the white light had a blue green glow and falling straight downward, there was no trailing behind or sparks and just glowing, i later sent a text message to a friend about the event, i did not report it to the police which might have ridiculed the repot, no film was taken because there was no time within 7 seconds, my view was blocked by buildings,
content.summary: Fireball falling straight down over queens n,y, from the southern direction

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my daughters mother were leaving a friends house it was about 12:30 to130am.Our house was only about 15 to 20 min away.We made a left.Onto rt 229 i remember seeing a reddish white light in thr rear view merror i turnd my head arround.That was the last thing i remember.Next thing that happend i came to car stillmoving not even to miles away from where the incodent accured we haddnt gone anywhere
it was a 2 in a half hour time laps.My daughters mother came to the same time and said what happend.I knew in my heart what happend
the next night i had a dream i was on the floor in the corner of a space craft screaming to let me go back i have a baby.They were kind of tall and grey.I woke . sweating.It felt like more than a dream it felt like a memory.Thats when i told my daughters mother what i thought happend.I was concerned they were going to come back for me.I didnt tell her that though.Arround this time they didnt really have anything about abduction storys and i didnt use the internet.This has been eating at me for years.Finaly ive learned there is groups and researchers that want to hear about peoples experiences.I want to know more.Also at the time this accured my daughters mother was pregnant.My daughter was born with a deffect.One hand is alitle smaller than the other and her fingers were webbed on the one hand.She has sence had corrective surgery.My daughters mother will not talk about this event she pretends it didnt happen but when i bring it up with details and facts she gets quiet.I dont know if you deal with abduction cases or just sightings.If you cant help can you please point me in the direction of someone who can.I would be willing to take a lie detector test as well as hipno therapy.
thank you.
sincerly
   miles
content.summary: It was a bright reddish white light saw a light in my rearview merror turned around, that was the last thing i remember till i came to hours later .Daughters mother experienced the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in louisville, ky and one night in 2010 my wife and i were sitting outside, enjoying the warm summer temperatures (at this point we lived off of hurstbourne- now we live in the bowman field area). we were looking at the sky and witnessed a grouping of three, perfectly spaced lights which were initially still, then began traveling south. the speed varied, as it was slow in the beginning, barely moving, then they sped up. at one point there was a directional change as though they simply pivoted in the sky. that was when we realized we were looking at something entirely different than we've seen before. the pivot then had them facing more of an east-west direction. they just simply stopped and smoothly did a turn from the stand-still. they didn't travel far after their directional change but, while we were watching, one the light on the right simply went dim and the light on the left moved toward the light in the center until they were presumably "one". we didn't make any assumptions as to what these lights were as we watched the now, brighter light fade into the night. it's hard to say, but to paraphrase, i think the flight pattern was this: 3 lights moving southward, the pivot happened, three lights moving east (toward us, slightly, though not close to us by any means). the right one faded, the left joined the middle, then the joined pair traveled southwest. it was pretty incredible and we were both in awe for a moment. to this day we speak casually about the "ufo" we saw that night- the fact of the matter is that we weren't hurt. we were filled with a sense of wonder and somehow, it was very peaceful. i believe the stories of those who have witnessed strange lights in louisville, and i hope that people still look to the sky at night. louisville's a beautiful city and there's nothing for us to fear.

*i should note that i now live next to a small airport (i did not at the time of the sighting), however i have seen nothing since then that remotely resembles what was in the sky that night. i'm used to seeing aircraft and it is my true belief that what we saw was not man-made.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light grouping of three moves southward, pivots to change directions and eventially disappears

content.detailedDescription:
Field investigator:
i interviewed a witness that shared an ufo sighting that took place he believes back in the winter of 1986 over manhattan, new york.  at around 09:00 pm, pedro c. and his friend nino were exiting a building after delivering a package near the corner of 35th street & 9th ave., and they both noticed a large, dark gray, boomerang-shaped ufo slowly hovering above their location.  pedro: ���it flew very slowly westerly and slightly made a sw turned and hovered out of sight towards the hudson river. the crazy thing is that there was a small propeller plane that circled this thing, it flew around and around it, clockwise.���  the boomerang craft did not make any noise and did not have lights - however the sound of the small general aviation plane���s propeller was heard.  pedro stated that the ufo flew rather closely over of the buildings; a few hundred feet from the rooftops, so that the cityscape lights were reflecting off the base of this craft. the sighting lasted about 5 minutes.   report by norman gagnon ��� star team fi.
content.summary: Boomerang craft witnessed by 2 flying above city - followed by a small plane.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 1, 2009 in mesa, az around 7:40 pm, i observed several different ufo's occurrences for nearly an hour which for me is extremely unusual, but it is the very last sighting of that evening i am wanting to really report first even though the other sightings are important too.

i had just moved to mesa, az in 2009 and decided to take some pictures of the full moon, so i set up my camera's tripod on the porch waiting for the full moon to get into view.  during that time, i was looking around in the sky when i started seeing these things occurring in the sky which for the whole evening  i had a total of  eight separated ufo sightings. in the last sighting around 8:34 pm which is what i really want to report, i was watching the sky towards the west when i saw what appeared to me to be a large flock of black color birds flying towards my direction at a very low altitude. i thought that flock of birds might be a good picture to take with the twilight slowly fading away in that direction where the sun had recently just set.  so i  peered via the camera's eyepiece viewer which the nikon camera had a 300mm telephoto lens attached to it.  what i saw traversing towards my location literally surprised me when i was only expecting a flock of birds flying in a tight group and at a low altitude.

  what i saw was absolutely bizarre and i had never seen anything like it before in my entire life-- one section of it appeared to be a very dim red light similar to a dim led light which had on each side of it two larger pure black sphere objects attached to the dim red light.  additionally, there was at least 50 of these things flying together in a group at equal short distant flying in perfect unison in a flatten diamond shape pattern.  furthermore, i thought i could see through between the spaces of these objects and faintly see the background behind it.  at that point, the object(s) started to get out of my view which i lifted up the camera and quickly relocated the camera to the north wall; in the process, someone was walking down the sidewalk, and i startled him.

 the man looked at me, then saw me looking though the camera, so he looked in that direction. he stared in that direction at the object for at least 5 seconds then looked back at me in surprise, then quickly continued on with his walking. to the naked eye, it may had looked like a flock of birds, but if he had looked through my camera's lens, he would had seen what i was seeing which i didn't tell him.  i began taking pictures of the object as it was traversing, but what i didn't realize at the moment that my iso film speed wasn't set correctly for low light condition.

  during the entire time, i never heard any noise being produced from the object. the object went directly over my head and started to make a sweeping turn. at that point, i lifted my camera up again trying to take pictures of it. i then relocated the camera to the west wall. when i looked up into the sky on the west wall side, i saw (with my own eyes) the object now appearing to have an extremely long "v" shape wing something like two rulers joint together to form a slight angle. it was somewhat similar to an stretched out boomerang shape. the dark color wings looked very skinny to me almost like a glider wing, very long and slender, and somewhat smoothly curved at the end.  i was also having a hard time trying to determine if it had actually a solid, black color wing since it almost seem like i could see through it. the object glided over me so slowly that i thought it was almost hovering over me for a brief moment. what shocked me even more was the distant in altitude this ufo was located in the sky.  i originally thought this object was at a low altitude like just above the rooftops, but it was in fact located at least and nearly three miles up in the air. i speculate that the total wingspan of this object was at least 100 yards in distant. the size of this object also appeared to me to be possibly 3 times the size of an 727a commercial jetliner. 

 this object had no fuselage but just pure flying wings.  i seen gliders before, and they have a fuselage, this object didn't. this object didn't even resemble closely any b-2 nor even a b-17 jet.  what was interesting that this unknown object came from the direction of the phoenix's sky-harbor airport and curved towards the gateway airport located in gilbert, az. the unknown object as it traveled in that direction just seem to get quickly smaller and melt away or blend into the darkness located in that direction.
of all the pictures i had taken, only one picture somewhat manage to come out showing either multiple objects or multiples pictures on just one picture due to trying to adjust the exposure towards the end of the event. 

i lived in mesa, az for nearly three years after that incident, and after i knew every normal bird flight pattern going though the area, and every plane and jet  pattern in the sky either high or low, and i have not once seen anything like that unknown object since that time. after that sighting, i had also experienced additional ufo sightings more than one person could possibly ever imagine one would be able to experience in a lifetime. i have now moved to a different city which is quite, but while i lived at in mesa, az, it was the hottest ufo hotspot if i ever saw one. the only ufo type i haven't technically seen thus far is that disk shape type...Well maybe if the huge angry looking eye object counts as one, and that one quite literally scared me pure white as a ghost, and i had to force myself to look into the camera's eyepiece.
content.summary: 50 dim red light objects looking like a flock of birds or flatten black diamond transforms into an elongated black boomerang wing with no fuselage.

content.detailedDescription: I was layying in bed watching tv when i saw lights near my animal pasture & barn. being i have heard of problems in the neighborhood with the local chapter of future felons of america i keep a few cameras out with monitors in the house. via the monitor it appeared there was someone in the pasture so i went out to deal with them. i saw multiple objects ranging in size from perhaps a basketball to a small car! they objects emited lights that changed apparently randomly to every conceivable color in the spectrum! they appeared 2-3 at a time. manuevered in apparently random yet controlled (if that makes sense) manners. as they varied wildly in speed & direction yet hit no obstructions ie trees powerlines, my barn etc! it was the strangest thing! i took many pictures & shot a lot of video and upon reviewwing the video i had considerable static in the audio!! i have never had this static on other ocassions & could not replicate it! the objects would come and move about individually or pairs and i saw trees and powerlines on both sides so i know what size & range they were. my animals were in the barn silently staring at eachother! the objects would vary speed, direction, color, brightness and altitude! i am a fairly observant individual so i noted everything i could & i had heard a helecopter an hour earlier and while i was watching this show an aircraft passed at altitude leaving a visable contrail. i could see its lights & knew it to be a passenger/cargo jet. when i saw these lights higher up! they appeared similar to the objects seen before me but were higher up. at times they would pass above the jet contrail being dimmed by it, other times apparently below it. their speed was almost as amazing as everything else about them. i saw one traverse 3/4 of the sky in about 2 seconds, literally! then at speed make a 90 deg turn! and yet another & head back to its original point of origin! i watched these for id guesss about two hrs until the last one appeared to lift vertically then pause for a second or two & upon emitting a flash of light depart at an incredible speed!!!!! these were not lantern kites, balloons, reflections off swamp gas nor a comet!! i'm not claiming them to be anything.. i would like to know what they were.. its rather upsetting to not be able to discuss this with anyone!
content.summary: Multiple objects ranging in size from
